import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{layDanhSachKhoaHoc,changePageAction}from"../redux/actions/QuanLyKhoaHoc";// render props là một kĩ thuật xử lý  việc chia sẻ logic giữa các React Component bằng cách sử dụng prop có value như một function.
var RenderDanhSachKhoaHoc=function RenderDanhSachKhoaHoc(props){var dispatch=useDispatch();var _useSelector=useSelector(function(state){return state.quanLyKhoaHoc;}),danhSachKhoaHoc=_useSelector.danhSachKhoaHoc,currentPage=_useSelector.currentPage,totalCount=_useSelector.totalCount;useEffect(function(){dispatch(layDanhSachKhoaHoc(currentPage,8));},[currentPage]);var onChangePage=function onChangePage(page){dispatch(changePageAction(page));};return React.createElement("div",null,props.render({danhSachKhoaHoc:danhSachKhoaHoc,currentPage:currentPage,totalCount:totalCount,onChangePage:onChangePage}));};export default RenderDanhSachKhoaHoc;
